package.name: open_manipulator
package.description: ROS-enabled OpenManipulator is a full open robot platform consisting of OpenSoftware​, OpenHardware and OpenCR(Embedded board)​. OpenManipulator are based on ROS ​and OpenSource. ROS official hardware platform, TurtleBot series has been supporting ‘TurtleBot Arm’. The OpenManipulator has full hardware compatibility with TurtleBot3​, and allows users to control it more easily by linking with the MoveIt! package. Even if you do not have a real robot, you can control the robot in the Gazebo simulator​.
package.author: Darby Lim
